verses.verse: Then Jerubbaal, <S%H3378><s%> who <S%H1931><s%> is Gideon, <S%H1439><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> that were with him, rose <S%H7925><s%> up early, <S%H7925><s%> and pitched <S%H2583><s%> beside <S%H5921><s%> the well <S%H5878><s%> of Harod: <S%H5878><s%> so that the host <S%H4264><s%> of the Midianites <S%H4080><s%> were on the north <S%H6828><s%> side of them, by the hill <S%H1389><s%> of Moreh, <S%H4176><s%> in the valley. <S%H6010><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Gideon, <S%H1439><s%> The people <S%H5971><s%> that are with you are too many <S%H7227><s%> for me to give <S%H5414><s%> the Midianites <S%H4080><s%> into their hands, <S%H3027><s%> lest <S%H6435><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> vaunt <S%H6286><s%> themselves against <S%H5921><s%> me, saying, <S%H559><s%> My own hand <S%H3027><s%> has saved <S%H3467><s%> me.

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore go <S%H4994><s%> to, proclaim <S%H7121><s%> in the ears <S%H241><s%> of the people, <S%H5971><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Whoever <S%H4310><s%> is fearful <S%H3373><s%> and afraid, <S%H2730><s%> let him return <S%H7725><s%> and depart <S%H6852><s%> early <S%H6852><s%> from mount <S%H2022><s%> Gilead. <S%H1568><s%> And there returned <S%H7725><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> thousand; <S%H505><s%> and there remained <S%H7604><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> thousand. <S%H505><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Gideon, <S%H1439><s%> The people <S%H5971><s%> are yet <S%H5750><s%> too many; <S%H7227><s%> bring <S%H3318><s%> them down <S%H3381><s%> to the water, <S%H4325><s%> and I will try <S%H6884><s%> them for you there: <S%H8033><s%> and it shall be, that of whom <S%H834><s%> I say <S%H559><s%> to you, This <S%H2088><s%> shall go <S%H3212><s%> with you, the same <S%H1931><s%> shall go <S%H3212><s%> with you; and of whomsoever <S%H834><s%> I say <S%H559><s%> to you, This <S%H2088><s%> shall not go <S%H3212><s%> with you, the same <S%H1931><s%> shall not go. <S%H3212><s%>

So he brought <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> to the water: <S%H4325><s%> and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Gideon, <S%H1439><s%> Every <S%H3605><s%> one that laps <S%H3952><s%> of the water <S%H4325><s%> with his tongue, <S%H3956><s%> as a dog <S%H3611><s%> laps, <S%H3952><s%> him shall you set <S%H3322><s%> by himself; likewise every <S%H3605><s%> one that bows <S%H3766><s%> down on his knees <S%H1290><s%> to drink. <S%H8354><s%>

And the number <S%H4557><s%> of them that lapped, <S%H3952><s%> putting their hand <S%H3027><s%> to their mouth, <S%H6310><s%> were three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> men: <S%H376><s%> but all <S%H3605><s%> the rest <S%H3499><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> bowed <S%H3766><s%> down on their knees <S%H1290><s%> to drink <S%H8354><s%> water. <S%H4325><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Gideon, <S%H1439><s%> By the three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> men <S%H376><s%> that lapped <S%H3952><s%> will I save <S%H3467><s%> you, and deliver <S%H5414><s%> the Midianites <S%H4080><s%> into your hand: <S%H3027><s%> and let all <S%H3605><s%> the other people <S%H5971><s%> go <S%H3212><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> to his place. <S%H4725><s%>

So the people <S%H5971><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> victuals <S%H6720><s%> in their hand, <S%H3027><s%> and their trumpets: <S%H7782><s%> and he sent <S%H7971><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the rest of Israel <S%H3478><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> to his tent, <S%H168><s%> and retained <S%H2388><s%> those three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> men: <S%H376><s%> and the host <S%H4264><s%> of Midian <S%H4080><s%> was beneath <S%H8478><s%> him in the valley. <S%H6010><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass the same <S%H1931><s%> night, <S%H3915><s%> that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, Arise, <S%H6965><s%> get <S%H3381><s%> you down <S%H3381><s%> to the host; <S%H4264><s%> for I have delivered <S%H5414><s%> it into your hand. <S%H3027><s%>

But if <S%H518><s%> you fear <S%H3373><s%> to go <S%H3381><s%> down, <S%H3381><s%> go <S%H3381><s%> you with Phurah <S%H6513><s%> your servant <S%H5288><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to the host: <S%H4264><s%>

And you shall hear <S%H8085><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> they say; <S%H1696><s%> and afterward <S%H310><s%> shall your hands <S%H3027><s%> be strengthened <S%H2388><s%> to go <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to the host. <S%H4264><s%> Then went <S%H3381><s%> he down <S%H3381><s%> with Phurah <S%H6513><s%> his servant <S%H5288><s%> to the outside <S%H7097><s%> of the armed <S%H2571><s%> men that were in the host. <S%H4264><s%>

And the Midianites <S%H4080><s%> and the Amalekites <S%H6003><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of the east <S%H6924><s%> lay <S%H5307><s%> along in the valley <S%H6010><s%> like grasshoppers <S%H697><s%> for multitude; <S%H7230><s%> and their camels <S%H1581><s%> were without <S%H369><s%> number, <S%H4557><s%> as the sand <S%H2344><s%> by the sea <S%H3220><s%> side <S%H8193><s%> for multitude. <S%H7230><s%>

And when Gideon <S%H1439><s%> was come, <S%H935><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> there was a man <S%H376><s%> that told <S%H5608><s%> a dream <S%H2472><s%> to his fellow, <S%H7453><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I dreamed <S%H2492><s%> a dream, <S%H2472><s%> and, see, <S%H2009><s%> a cake <S%H6742><s%> of barley <S%H8184><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> tumbled <S%H2015><s%> into the host <S%H4264><s%> of Midian, <S%H4080><s%> and came <S%H935><s%> to a tent, <S%H168><s%> and smote <S%H5221><s%> it that it fell, <S%H5307><s%> and overturned <S%H2015><s%> it, that the tent <S%H168><s%> lay <S%H5307><s%> along.

And his fellow <S%H7453><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> This <S%H2063><s%> is nothing <S%H369><s%> else save <S%H1115><s%> <S%H518><s%> the sword <S%H2719><s%> of Gideon <S%H1439><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Joash, <S%H3101><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%> for into his hand <S%H3027><s%> has God <S%H430><s%> delivered <S%H5414><s%> Midian, <S%H4080><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the host. <S%H4264><s%>

And it was so, when Gideon <S%H1439><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> the telling <S%H4557><s%> of the dream, <S%H2472><s%> and the interpretation <S%H7667><s%> thereof, that he worshipped, <S%H7812><s%> and returned <S%H7725><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the host <S%H4264><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Arise; <S%H6965><s%> for the LORD <S%H3068><s%> has delivered <S%H5414><s%> into your hand <S%H3027><s%> the host <S%H4264><s%> of Midian. <S%H4080><s%>

And he divided <S%H2673><s%> the three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> men <S%H376><s%> into three <S%H7969><s%> companies, <S%H7218><s%> and he put <S%H5414><s%> a trumpet <S%H7782><s%> in every <S%H3605><s%> man's hand, <S%H3027><s%> with empty <S%H7385><s%> pitchers, <S%H3537><s%> and lamps <S%H3940><s%> within <S%H8432><s%> the pitchers. <S%H3537><s%>

And he said <S%H559><s%> to them, Look <S%H7200><s%> on me, and do <S%H6213><s%> likewise: <S%H3651><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> when I come <S%H935><s%> to the outside <S%H7097><s%> of the camp, <S%H4264><s%> it shall be that, as I do, <S%H6213><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> shall you do. <S%H6213><s%>

When I blow <S%H8628><s%> with a trumpet, <S%H7782><s%> I and all <S%H3605><s%> that are with me, then blow <S%H8628><s%> you the trumpets <S%H7782><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> on every <S%H3605><s%> side <S%H5439><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the camp, <S%H4264><s%> and say, <S%H559><s%> The sword of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and of Gideon. <S%H1439><s%>

So Gideon, <S%H1439><s%> and the hundred <S%H3967><s%> men <S%H376><s%> that were with him, came <S%H935><s%> to the outside <S%H7097><s%> of the camp <S%H4264><s%> in the beginning <S%H7218><s%> of the middle <S%H8484><s%> watch; <S%H821><s%> and they had but newly <S%H6965><s%> set <S%H6965><s%> the watch: <S%H8104><s%> and they blew <S%H8628><s%> the trumpets, <S%H7782><s%> and broke <S%H5310><s%> the pitchers <S%H3537><s%> that were in their hands. <S%H3027><s%>

And the three <S%H7969><s%> companies <S%H7218><s%> blew <S%H8628><s%> the trumpets, <S%H7782><s%> and broke <S%H7665><s%> the pitchers, <S%H3537><s%> and held <S%H2388><s%> the lamps <S%H3940><s%> in their left <S%H8040><s%> hands, <S%H3027><s%> and the trumpets <S%H7782><s%> in their right <S%H3225><s%> hands <S%H3027><s%> to blow <S%H8628><s%> with: and they cried, <S%H7121><s%> The sword <S%H2719><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and of Gideon. <S%H1439><s%>

And they stood <S%H5975><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> in his place <S%H8478><s%> round <S%H5439><s%> about the camp; <S%H4264><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the host <S%H4264><s%> ran, <S%H7323><s%> and cried, <S%H7321><s%> and fled. <S%H5127><s%>

And the three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> blew <S%H8628><s%> the trumpets, <S%H7782><s%> and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> set <S%H7760><s%> every man's <S%H376><s%> sword <S%H2719><s%> against his fellow, <S%H7453><s%> even throughout all <S%H3605><s%> the host: <S%H4264><s%> and the host <S%H4264><s%> fled <S%H5127><s%> to Bethshittah <S%H1029><s%> in Zererath, <S%H6888><s%> and to the border <S%H8193><s%> of Abelmeholah, <S%H65><s%> to Tabbath. <S%H2888><s%>

And the men <S%H376><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> gathered <S%H6817><s%> themselves together out of Naphtali, <S%H5321><s%> and out of Asher, <S%H836><s%> and out of all <S%H3605><s%> Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> and pursued <S%H7291><s%> after <S%H310><s%> the Midianites. <S%H4080><s%>

And Gideon <S%H1439><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> messengers <S%H4397><s%> throughout all <S%H3605><s%> mount <S%H2022><s%> Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> come <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> against <S%H7125><s%> the Midianites, <S%H4080><s%> and take <S%H3920><s%> before them the waters <S%H4325><s%> to Bethbarah <S%H1012><s%> and Jordan. <S%H3383><s%> Then all <S%H3605><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%> gathered <S%H6817><s%> themselves together, and took <S%H3920><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> to Bethbarah <S%H1012><s%> and Jordan. <S%H3383><s%>

And they took <S%H3920><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> princes <S%H8269><s%> of the Midianites, <S%H4080><s%> Oreb <S%H6157><s%> and Zeeb; <S%H2062><s%> and they slew <S%H2026><s%> Oreb <S%H6157><s%> on the rock <S%H6697><s%> Oreb, <S%H6157><s%> and Zeeb <S%H2062><s%> they slew <S%H2026><s%> at the wine press <S%H3342><s%> of Zeeb, <S%H2062><s%> and pursued <S%H7291><s%> Midian, <S%H4080><s%> and brought <S%H935><s%> the heads <S%H7218><s%> of Oreb <S%H6157><s%> and Zeeb <S%H2062><s%> to Gideon <S%H1439><s%> on the other <S%H5676><s%> side <S%H5676><s%> Jordan. <S%H3383><s%>
